bibl.title: Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies
bibl.note: Pp. 138-139: The text of P. Chester Beatty II Suppl. (= van Haelst 497; LDAB 3011) in Romans 16:7. - Non vidimus.
bibl.seg: EPP Eldon J., Minor Textual Variants in Romans 16:7.
J.W. CHILDERS and D.C. PARKER (Edd.), Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies (Piscataway, NJ, 2006) pp. 123-141.
